page.title: 02PRIMARY SCHOOL LIFE.
page.content: I GO TO SCHOOL AT 8.55. I READ A BOOK CALLED" THE RUNAWAY ". AT SCHOOL WE WATCH A T.V PROGRAMME CALLED{ZIG ZAG. YOU CAN JOIN{CLUBS}AT SCHOOL ALTHOUGH I DON'T BELONG TO ANY OF THEM. I PLAY THE RECORDER AND THE VIOLIN. FOR LUNCH I HAVE SANDWICHES, AN APPLE AND A CHOCOLATE BISCUIT. USUALLY I HAVE A PLAYTIME SNACK. WE OFTEN HELP THE TEACHER IN THE CLASSROOM AND OUTDOORS BY DOING JOBS FOR HER. WE USE PENCIL AT SCHOOL- ONLY THE OLDER CHILDREN USE FOUNTAIN PEN. THE SCHOOL IS NOT ALLOWED TO CANE THE NAUGHTY CHILDREN, ONLY PRIVATE SCHOOLS CAN.AT SCHOOL WE WEAR T.SHIRTS AND SHORTS FOR P.E. OUR SUMMER DRESSES ARE BLUE CHECK. WINTER UNIFORM IS GREY, BLUE AND WHITE. THE GIRLS ARE ONLY ALLOWED TO WEAR TROUSERS IN WINTER.THE SCHOOL HAS ITS OWN{SWIMMING POOL}AND A LARGE NEW PLAYING FIELD. SCHOOL ENDS AT 3.15.
